unnormalised: Arre, poilya mhoineak mhajea electricity bill ₹3500 aslem! Hanvem 250 units vaparlem, ani mhaka khatri asa mhajea padoshean fokot 100 units vaparlem punn sumar teach promannant bhortuk dilo.
normalised:
Arre, fattchea mhoineaak mhojem electricity bill teen hozar panchshe rupee ailem!
Hanv donxem panchvis units vaparlem, ani mhaka khatri asa mhojea bazuchean fokot ekxem units vaparlem astolem punn lagbhag sarkhech duddu bhorle astele.
text: Arre, poilya mhoineak mhajea electricity bill ₹3500 aslem! Hanvem 250 units vaparlem, ani mhaka khatri asa mhajea padoshean fokot 100 units vaparlem punn sumar teach promannant bhortuk dilo.
